Author: Microsoft Developer
Description:
The future of document intelligence is here with Mistral Document AI in Azure AI Foundry. In this episode, April shows you how the model parses complex layouts from PDFs and handwritten notes. You’ll also see how the model’s structured JSON output makes it possible to integrate with databases, AI agents, and RAG workflows—turning unstructured documents into actionable data.

Try it yourself in Azure AI Foundry and start parsing documents and images: ai.azure.com

Get the code from this episode: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/code

Learn more about Mistral Document AI: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/mistral-document-AI

Join the Discord: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/discord Hop on Forum: https://aka.ms/insideAIF/forum

Chapters: 00:00 - Intro 01:10 - Deploy the model 01:59 - Access the sample code 03:02 - Run the Document AI with base64 pdf sample 12:56 - Run the Document AI with base64 image sample 14:54 - Outro
Title: Mistral Document AI in Azure AI Foundry
